sentences.en: If the company was to relocate, most employees would move.
sentences.cn: 如果公司要迁移，大多数员工得搬家。

sentences.en: The firm may be forced to relocate from New York to Stanford.
sentences.cn: 公司也许会被迫从纽约迁移到斯坦福。

sentences.en: It is not economically practical to close or relocate the factories.
sentences.cn: 关闭或迁移工厂在经济上是不现实的。
